title: Dubinik® Mens Flannel Shirts Long Sleeve Flannel Shirt for Men Casual Button Down Brushed 100% Cotton Shirt
description: 【True to size】 Dubinik mens flannel shirts long sleeve were true to US sizing,If you're not sure what size to buy, check the size chart based on the size of the clothes you usually wear. If you like a baggy shirt, a size up is probably best.

【Washing advice】Our flannel shirt for men are machine washable/hand washable, easy care for，and low iron if necessary. Recommended tumble dry on low heat. If you have any questions, please feel free to click on the store [Dubinik] to contact us.

【Pre-shrunk, Attention to detail】These men's casual button-down shirts ​have been pre-shrunk during the production process and does not fade.And will go through a strict quality test process before sending it out. So you don't need to worry about product problems such as breakage, buttons falling off, or pilling and shrinking after washing.Our products are available in a variety of colors: black and white, green, red, blue, navy, khaki, brown, gray, burgundy,orange, and many more.

【Design Features】Our western men flannel shirt has a practical left chest pocket.Stylish button-down collar design,soft brown corduroy at the neckline and inside of the cuffs. Built-in locker loop to hang your men's flannel shirts long sleeve. Heavy men's flannel full sleeve shirt wrinkle free Easy care, suitable for many scenes: work, outdoor, country, hiking, lumberjack, and more.The perfect men's flannel shirt to gift to your father, or son, for Christmas, birthday, or anniversaries.

【High-quality, Classic design】Every mens button down long sleeve shirts are made of durable brushed fleece flannel, which is comfortable,warm, as well as soft lightweight, and breathable. And adopts a stylish check design, and perfectly combines functionality and fashion. It's suitable as a work shirt or daily wear in spring, fall, and winter.This buffalo plaid men's flannel shirt is the perfect flannel top that can be worn with jackets, t-shirts, and jeans and is very loose and relaxed.
